items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This dress was absolutely amazing! The sellers contacted me to get exact measurements, so it fit perfectly. It was very good quality and I received a ton of complements. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!!!
items.body: Absolutely stunning!!! I didn't expect the company to message and ask for her measurements. They also made the dress so that it would be easier for her to sit and more comfortable in her wheelchair without the fluff in the back. The color was lighter than shown in the picture, but it was still pretty. They made everything to fit her, even the length. It was well-made, and I didn't have to worry about it ripping easily. I will definitely order again from this company. 10 out of 10 amazing!!! Great dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Made really well. My granddaughter looked beautiful!! Read more
items.author: Donna Wittneben

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Homecoming Dress
items.body: Seller was very responsive and easy to work with. Material was better than expected and fit properly. It took a little steaming to have the dress ready the same day, but will definitely use this company for dance dresses again. Read more
items.author: Seth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Glinda.. but smells kind of stinky!
items.body: I bought this size 16 dress for my Glinda costume! It was perfect for a Halloween costume but maybe not for long term wear. It was very pretty on and it flows well! I am wearing a hoop shirt I bought separately in the picture below so it doesnâ€™t come naturally with a puffy skirt. Truly the only downside was the dress stunk to high heavens when I opened the package. I had to wash it and air it out to get the smell out. That may be a one time thing but it is just something to be cautious of! The smell did come out! ðŸ˜€ Read more
items.author: Ally Fink

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never had customer service this good before.
items.body: This product looks gorgeous and fits perfectly. When you order, the company sends you a message asking for the measurements and what date you need it by so that you donâ€™t miss your special event. I cannot recommend this product and company highly enough. Iâ€™d give 10 stars. Read more
items.author: erichwithanh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use a steamer!!!
items.body: I really love this dress! Itâ€™s a poofy princess dress for sure. The corset back is amazing & makes it size inclusive. I weigh 280 lbs and am around 5â€™6â€ and this is how the size 26 fit me. As my title says, use a steamer to get allllll the wrinkles from packaging out, you wonâ€™t regret it! Read more
items.author: Alisha Baldwin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly and Elegant
items.body: I wore the sparkly tool gown to a ball and it definitely made me feel like the center of the room! The spaghetti straps and tiered skirt gave it a dreamy fairy tale vibe and the glitter sparkle and the light was gorgeous. It was a little stiff so I would recommend using a steamer. The bodice fit well and it felt comfortable for most of the evening. That said, the full skirt made it a little bit tricky to dance overall, if you want to look stunning and feel confident this dress works beautifully. It was on the heavier side but it wasn't so much that I could move and dance. Read more
items.author: Samantha McMahill

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Fuchsia, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Rose Red, Peacock, Baby Blue, Plum, Lavender, Royal Blue, Mauve, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
